answer:
QUESTION
Comment this answer with respect to Quran and Hadith. 2. How many times this dua to be recited in a day to full fill the desire of SON as we have daugther. Your answer in earlier question: Hopelessness of Acquiring a Son O My Lord! Grant me from Yourself a progeny that is pure; for You are the Granter of prayers (Juz 3 Rk.12) By the excessive recitation of the above verse, a person will, Insha Allah, acquire a virtuous and righteous son. Virtuous Children O My Lod! Do not leave me without offspring. Surely, you are the best of inheritors. (Juz 17 Rk6) Recite the above Aayat three times after every Salaat. Good and righteous children will be granted, Insha Allah. and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best Mufti Ebrahim Desai FATWA DEPT.
ANSWER


Share:
There is no specific number of times for these verses to be recited.

Recite these verses as much as you can and place your trust and the best outcome for yourself to Allah.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
